results.title: Iatrogenic metrorrhagia after the use of itraconazole for onychomycosis
results.text_hl: We present first case report on @CHEMICAL_Itraconazole @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017964 @@@itraconazole@@@, a drug very commonly used for @<m>DISEASE_Onychomycosis</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D014009 @@@onychomycosis@@@, used along with @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ that caused @DISEASE_Metrorrhagia @DISEASE_MESH:D008796 @@@metrorrhagia@@@.

citations.NLM: Brzezinski P, Gulin SJ, Gulin D, Chiriac A. Iatrogenic metrorrhagia after the use of itraconazole for onychomycosis Indian J Pharmacol. 2017 Nov-Dec;49(6):470-471. PMID: 29674803
